creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas and gift of Robert T. Coffland in memory of Mary Hunt Kahlenberg
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: nearly square panel; medium brown with black designs in four quadrants; two quadrants have similar motifs with rectangular grinds surrounded by freeform triangles with parallel lines, stars, and dark bow tie shapes; one quadrant has similar grids place irregularly along two side and arcs made of pairs of curving line in one corner; one quadrant has dark zigzags and triangles with parallel lines
title: Barkcloth panel
